oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Advances in carbon nanotube-noble metal catalyzed organic transformations
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: JOHN, J
GRAVEL, E
NAMBOOTHIRI, INN
DORIS, E
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: carbon nanotubes
heterogeneous catalysis
nanoparticles
noble metals
organic reactions
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This review article is dealing with heterogeneous catalysis applied to synthetic chemistry using various carbon nanotube-supported noble metals (e. g., ruthenium, rhodium, palladium, silver, osmium, iridium, platinum, and gold).
